glsa.title: tla: Multiple vulnerabilities in included libneon
glsa.synopsis: tla includes a vulnerable version of the neon library.

background.p: GNU Arch (tla) is a revision control system suited for widely distributed development.

description.p: Multiple format string vulnerabilities and a heap overflow vulnerability were discovered in the code of the neon library (GLSA 200405-01 and 200405-13). Current versions of the tla package include their own version of this library.

impact.p: When connected to a malicious WebDAV server, these vulnerabilities could allow execution of arbitrary code with the rights of the user running tla.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All users of tla should upgrade to the latest stable version:
